name: funpartss

stmt.origin: eqsstri(cfunpart(c0), c0, cres(c0, cdm(cin(ccom(cimage(c0), csingle), cxp(universe, csingles)))))

body.origin:
|- wss(cfunpart(c0), c0)
-| wceq(cfunpart(c0), cres(c0, cdm(cin(ccom(cimage(c0), csingle), cxp(universe, csingles)))))
-| wss(cres(c0, cdm(cin(ccom(cimage(c0), csingle), cxp(universe, csingles)))), c0)
body.pretty:
⊢ Funpart(c0)⊆ c0
⊣ Funpart(c0)=(c0 |` dom(((Image(c0)∘ Singleton)⋂(𝕌 × Singletons))))
⊣ (c0 |` dom(((Image(c0)∘ Singleton)⋂(𝕌 × Singletons))))⊆ c0
